name: Catch a berry!
description:
Catch a Berry is a hardcore game that will kill your nerve cells!

In the game you have to collect berries and dodge falling chickens and angry radishes!

Sounds easy? Oh, but it is not.

More than 40 points you are unlikely to get get. (͡ ͡° ͜ つ ͡͡°) 

By the way, you can resurrect for one heart after losing!
